process_model.name: AS GSS Generate Evaluation Tasks
process_model.description: Process to trigger evaluation tasks creation for all assignees

expression_rules.name: AS_CO_UT_filterRecordByFieldValues
expression_rules.description: Returns any record that contains any of the provided values in the field

data.sail_code:
cast(
  typeof(a!flatten(ri!records)),
  filter(
    rule!AS_CO_UT_zInternal_filterRecordByFieldValue_Multiple(
      record: _,
      field: ri!field,
      values: ri!values
    ),
    a!flatten(ri!records)
  )
)
data.definition:
cast(
  typeof(a!flatten(ri!records)),
  filter(
    rule!AS_CO_UT_zInternal_filterRecordByFieldValue_Multiple(
      record: _,
      field: ri!field,
      values: ri!values
    ),
    a!flatten(ri!records)
  )
)

test_cases.test_name: Simple field, single record, single value matches
Simple field, multiple records, single value matches both
Simple field, multiple records, single value matches one
Simple field, multiple records, multiple value matches one
Simple field, multiple records, multiple value matches both
Simple field, single record, single value does not match
Simple field, multiple records, single value does not match
Simple field, multiple records, multiple values none match

expression_rules.name: AS_GSS_QR_getCriteria
expression_rules.description: Generic query expression for criteria (aka factor) record data

inputs.name: isParent
inputs.description: If a value is provided for `parentCriteriaId`, this must be null

inputs.name: parentCriteriaId
inputs.description: If a value is provided for `isParent`, this must be empty

expression_rules.name: AS_GSS_UT_constructAssigneeWithMappedCriteria
expression_rules.description: Expression rule to create a map for each evaluator and corresponding criteria assignments

expression_rules.name: AS_CO_UT_not
expression_rules.description: Null handles for not -- null returns true (null acts like false)

expression_rules.name: AS_CO_UT_rejectNullValuesFromArray
expression_rules.description: Removes null values from an array of primitive types or CDTs (for CDT the index must be null, not each field)

expression_rules.name: AS_CO_UT_distinct
expression_rules.description: Returns the distinct values from a list.

expression_rules.name: AS_CO_UT_queryRecord
expression_rules.description: Helper rule to execute record queries with minimal overhead, pass `returnType` based on the query purpose

data.sail_code:
rule!AS_CO_UT_queryRecord(
  recordType: recordType!AS_GSS_CriteriaAssignment_SYNCEDRECORD,
  filters: {
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: recordType!AS_GSS_CriteriaAssignment_SYNCEDRECORD.criteriaId,
      operator: "in",
      value: ri!criteriaId,
      applyWhen: rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!criteriaId)
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: recordType!AS_GSS_CriteriaAssignment_SYNCEDRECORD.assignee,
      operator: "=",
      value: ri!assignee,
      applyWhen: rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!assignee)
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: recordType!AS_GSS_CriteriaAssignment_SYNCEDRECORD.isActive,
      operator: "=",
      value: true,
      applyWhen: rule!AS_CO_UT_not(ri!getActiveAndInactive = true)
    ),
    ri!additionalfilters
  },
  relatedRecordData: ri!relatedRecordData,
  fields: rule!AS_CO_UT_rejectNullValuesFromArray({ ri!fields }),
  sort: ri!sortInfo,
  pagingInfo: ri!pagingInfo,
  returnType: ri!returnType,
  executeWhen: ri!executeWhen,
  triggerRefresh: ri!triggerRefresh,
  logicalExpression: ri!logicalExpression,
  aggregationFields: ri!aggregationFields
)
data.definition:
rule!AS_CO_UT_queryRecord(
  recordType: recordType!AS_GSS_CriteriaAssignment_SYNCEDRECORD,
  filters: {
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: recordType!AS_GSS_CriteriaAssignment_SYNCEDRECORD.criteriaId,
      operator: "in",
      value: ri!criteriaId,
      applyWhen: rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!criteriaId)
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: recordType!AS_GSS_CriteriaAssignment_SYNCEDRECORD.assignee,
      operator: "=",
      value: ri!assignee,
      applyWhen: rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!assignee)
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: recordType!AS_GSS_CriteriaAssignment_SYNCEDRECORD.isActive,
      operator: "=",
      value: true,
      applyWhen: rule!AS_CO_UT_not(ri!getActiveAndInactive = true)
    ),
    ri!additionalfilters
  },
  relatedRecordData: ri!relatedRecordData,
  fields: rule!AS_CO_UT_rejectNullValuesFromArray({ ri!fields }),
  sort: ri!sortInfo,
  pagingInfo: ri!pagingInfo,
  returnType: ri!returnType,
  executeWhen: ri!executeWhen,
  triggerRefresh: ri!triggerRefresh,
  logicalExpression: ri!logicalExpression,
  aggregationFields: ri!aggregationFields
)

constants.name: AS_CO_ENUM_QE_RETURN_TYPE_OBJECT_ARRAY
constants.description: OBJECT_ARRAY - Returns an array type of the CDT when passed to rule `AS_CO_UT_queryEntity`

constants.name: AS_CO_ENUM_QE_RETURN_TYPE_SINGLE_OBJECT
constants.description: SINGLE_OBJECT - Returns a single type of the CDT when passed to rule `AS_CO_UT_queryEntity`

record_types.name: AS_GSS_CriteriaAssignment_SYNCEDRECORD
record_types.description: Synced Record Type for Criteria Assignments

views.ui_expr:
#"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_recordGridField"(
  columns: {
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "Assignment Id",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_CriteriaAssignment_SYNCEDRECORD.assignmentId,
      value: fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_CriteriaAssignment_SYNCEDRECORD.assignmentId],
      align: "END"
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "Criteria Id",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_CriteriaAssignment_SYNCEDRECORD.criteriaId,
      value: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_linkField"(
        links: {
          #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_recordLink"(
            label: fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_CriteriaAssignment_SYNCEDRECORD.criteriaId],
            recordType: recordType!AS_GSS_CriteriaAssignment_SYNCEDRECORD,
            identifier: fv!identifier
          )
        }
      ),
      align: "END"
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "Assignee",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_CriteriaAssignment_SYNCEDRECORD.assignee,
      value: fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_CriteriaAssignment_SYNCEDRECORD.assignee]
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "Created By",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_CriteriaAssignment_SYNCEDRECORD.createdBy,
      value: fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_CriteriaAssignment_SYNCEDRECORD.createdBy]
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "Created Datetime",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_CriteriaAssignment_SYNCEDRECORD.createdDatetime,
      value: if(
      isnull(fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_CriteriaAssignment_SYNCEDRECORD.createdDatetime]),
      fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_CriteriaAssignment_SYNCEDRECORD.createdDatetime],
      datetext(fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_CriteriaAssignment_SYNCEDRECORD.createdDatetime], "default")
      ),
      align: "END"
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "Modified By",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_CriteriaAssignment_SYNCEDRECORD.modifiedBy,
      value: fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_CriteriaAssignment_SYNCEDRECORD.modifiedBy]
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "Modified Datetime",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_CriteriaAssignment_SYNCEDRECORD.modifiedDatetime,
      value: if(
      isnull(fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_CriteriaAssignment_SYNCEDRECORD.modifiedDatetime]),
      fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_CriteriaAssignment_SYNCEDRECORD.modifiedDatetime],
      datetext(fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_CriteriaAssignment_SYNCEDRECORD.modifiedDatetime], "default")
      ),
      align: "END"
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "Is Active",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_CriteriaAssignment_SYNCEDRECORD.isActive,
      value: fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_CriteriaAssignment_SYNCEDRECORD.isActive]
    )
  },
  pageSize: 50,
  shadeAlternateRows: true
)
